<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the Loop Distribution Pass.  Its main focus is to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distribute loops that cannot be vectorized due to dependence cycles.  It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tries to isolate the offending dependences into a new loop allowing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectorization of the remaining parts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For dependence analysis, the pass uses the LoopVectorizer&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopAccessAnalysis.  Because this analysis presumes no change in the order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memory operations, special care is taken to preserve the lexical order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly to the Vectorizer, the pass also supports loop versioning to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// run-time disambiguate potentially overlapping arrays.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar/LoopDistribute.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Merges partitions in order to ensure that no loads are duplicated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We can&#39;t duplicate loads because that could potentially reorder them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LoopAccessAnalysis provides dependency information with the context that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the order of memory operation is preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return if any partitions were merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#a154fa6f1a3465a4e2e103cf22d888a33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#a154fa6f1a3465a4e2e103cf22d888a33">mergeToAvoidDuplicatedLoads</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LoadToPartitionT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Instruction &#42;, InstPartition &#42;&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ToBeMergedT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses&lt;InstPartition &#42;&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LoadToPartitionT LoadToPartition;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ToBeMergedT ToBeMerged;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step through the partitions and create equivalence between partitions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that contain the same load.  Also put partitions in between them in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same equivalence class to avoid reordering of memory operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PartitionContainerT::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = PartitionContainer.begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       E = PartitionContainer.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PartI = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a load occurs in two partitions PartI and PartJ, merge all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partitions (PartI, PartJ&#93; into PartI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst : &#42;PartI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewElt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoadToPartitionT::iterator LoadToPart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::tie(LoadToPart, NewElt) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">              LoadToPartition.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Inst, PartI));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewElt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;LDist: Merging partitions due to this load in multiple &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;partitions: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; PartI &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; LoadToPart-&gt;second &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &lt;&lt; &#42;Inst &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PartJ = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">              --PartJ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">              ToBeMerged.unionSets(PartI, &amp;&#42;PartJ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;&#42;PartJ != LoadToPart-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ToBeMerged.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge the member of an equivalence class into its class leader.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// makes the members empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ToBeMergedT::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ToBeMerged.begin(), E = ToBeMerged.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;isLeader())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PartI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getData();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PartJ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::next(ToBeMerged.member&#95;begin(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re cloning the preheader along with the loop so we already made sure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it was empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;&#42;OrigPH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>() == OrigPH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Preserve the original loop ID for use after the transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;OrigLoopID = L-&gt;getLoopID();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a loop for each partition except the last.  Clone the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop before PH along with adding a preheader for the cloned loop.  Then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update PH to point to the newly added preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;TopPH = OrigPH;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/lib/target/xtensa/mctargetdesc/xtensaasmbackend-cpp/#a13a0babfc55adc9b798c39e65ec9e8a3">getSize</a>() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Part : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">llvm::drop&#95;begin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(PartitionContainer))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewLoop = Part.cloneLoopWithPreheader(TopPH, Pred, Index, LI, DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Part.getVMap()&#91;ExitBlock&#93; = TopPH;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Part.remapInstructions();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      setNewLoopID(OrigLoopID, &amp;Part);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      --Index;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TopPH = NewLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ac3280e7f76f955403fe17eacf126b90d">getLoopPreheader</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pred-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(OrigPH, TopPH);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also set a new loop ID for the last loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setNewLoopID(OrigLoopID, &amp;PartitionContainer.back());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now go in forward order and update the immediate dominator for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preheaders with the exiting block of the previous loop.  Dominance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within the loop is updated in cloneLoopWithPreheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Curr = PartitionContainer.cbegin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> = std::next(PartitionContainer.cbegin()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">              E = PartitionContainer.cend();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> != E; ++Curr, ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DT-&gt;changeImmediateDominator(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The control structure to merge adjacent partitions if both satisfy</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For each memory instruction, this class maintains difference of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// number of unsafe dependences that start out from this instruction minus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// those that end here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// By traversing the memory instructions in program order and accumulating this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// number, we know whether any unsafe dependence crosses over a program point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences/#aca344468bf3859d766b2dd67ceb7df59">MemoryInstructionDependences</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LAI = &amp;LAIs.getInfo(&#42;L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently, we only distribute to isolate the part of the loop with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependence cycles to enable partial vectorization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LAI-&gt;canVectorizeMemory())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpfisellowering-cpp/#ab794ca855b323cdcfbf21f4a2205bdcf">fail</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MemOpsCanBeVectorized&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;memory operations are safe for vectorization&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Dependences = LAI-&gt;getDepChecker().getDependences();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Dependences || Dependences-&gt;empty())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;LDist: Found a candidate loop: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; L-&gt;getHeader()-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer">InstPartitionContainer</a> Partitions(L, LI, DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, go through each memory operation and assign them to consecutive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partitions (the order of partitions follows program order).  Put those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with unsafe dependences into &quot;cyclic&quot; partition otherwise put each store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in its own &quot;non-cyclic&quot; partition (we&#39;ll merge these later).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that a memory operation (e.g. Load2 below) at a program point that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has an unsafe dependence (Store3-&gt;Load1) spanning over it must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// included in the same cyclic partition as the dependent operations.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is to preserve the original program order after distribution.  E.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd  NumUnsafeDependencesActive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Load1   -.                     1                       0-&gt;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Load2    | /Unsafe/            0                       1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Store3  -&#39;                    -1                       1-&gt;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Load4                          0                       0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NumUnsafeDependencesActive &gt; 0 indicates this situation and in this case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we just keep assigning to the same cyclic partition until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NumUnsafeDependencesActive reaches 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydepchecker">MemoryDepChecker</a> &amp;DepChecker = LAI-&gt;getDepChecker();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences">MemoryInstructionDependences</a> MID(DepChecker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydepchecker/#a77779b1cb3dd7968c598f9d6de68282e">getMemoryInstructions</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     &#42;Dependences);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumUnsafeDependencesActive = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;InstDep : MID) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = InstDep.Inst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We update NumUnsafeDependencesActive post-instruction, catch the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// start of a dependence directly via NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumUnsafeDependencesActive ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InstDep.NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Partitions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#ad3b1855aab0d6db5fca73b22ba442b50">addToCyclicPartition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Partitions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#ae2c300c4031c2ec4a11e3099f7997826">addToNewNonCyclicPartition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumUnsafeDependencesActive &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Negative number of dependences active&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add partitions for values used outside.  These partitions can be out of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Filter out checks between pointers from the same partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p PtrToPartition contains the partition number for pointers.  Partition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// number -1 means that the pointer is used in multiple partitions.  In this</span></CodeLine>
